alert.note: Alert for Central Piscataquis; Northern Piscataquis; Northern Somerset; Northwest Aroostook (Maine) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued November 26 at 6:33AM EST until November 27 at 7:00PM EST by NWS Caribou
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 1 AM TO 7 PM EST MONDAY... * WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations between 2 and 8 inches. Winds gusting 25 to 35 mph. * WHERE...Central Piscataquis, Northwest Aroostook, Northern Piscataquis, and Northern Somerset Counties. * WHEN...From 1 AM to 7 PM EST Monday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be difficult. Most snowfall will occur Monday morning, with moderate to heavy snowfall potentially impacting the Monday morning commute. Gusty winds are also likely, and could bring down some tree branches.
info.instruction: A Winter Weather Advisory for snow means periods of snow will cause primarily travel difficulties. Expect snow covered roads and limited visibilities, and use caution while driving. The latest road conditions for Maine can be obtained by going to newengland511.org.

area.areaDesc: Central Piscataquis; Northern Piscataquis; Northern Somerset; Northwest Aroostook
